name: Space Mineware
description:
Space Shooter is an infinite runner game with the goal of being number 1 of the global scoreboard More Info: This game are my first project when i started to use the Godot Engine, i have spend too much time in this and i will accept all construtive comments to improve the game, note some funcionallities is under development, thanks!

This project has been idealized by that project: #24 - Desenvolva jogos com a Godot engine - Sons para o jogo - YouTube
